Wives in luxury

In the second season of the reality show titled Wives in luxury (Feleségek luxuskivitelben), gilded life comes back to shine, and we can continue to watch the everyday life of millionaire wives, who haven’t even heard about boredom. Vivien Vasvári, Babett Köllő, Smaltig Dalma and Boglárka Csősz are joined by Yvonne Dederick and Tünde Polgár, who stir things up around the tangled and fragile friendships while showcasing a whole new side of the upper-class life to the viewers.

Two tummy bumps will definitely be the star of this season, but it won’t lack travels abroad, parties, expensive clothes, unexpected turns, medical emergencies and, of course, door slams, as the millionaire wives don’t belie themselves. Intrigue, gossip, and disputes weave into the gorgeous adventures, but they always have each other’s back in trouble. Every character has their own divine and colorful personality, but they share their sense of purpose, power, and the incredible wealth from which they often donate to charities. They can be loved, hated, or envied for their glamourous life, but one thing is for sure: everyone talks about them. Made on behalf of Sony AXN Hungary.
